初遇.encontent:
Balloons ... you need some balloons here. That's why
 I brought them. Say cheese.
初遇.content:
气球……你们这儿还缺一点气球。所以，我把它们带来了
。笑一个吧。

箱中气候.encontent:
How I wanna tear the clouds apart. A party needs a
 lawn.
箱中气候.content: 我多想把这些云彩撕碎。派对需要草坪。

致未来.encontent:
But, if time stands still, there'll never be the next
 party. Ah ... I have to think about it.
致未来.content:
但是，如果时间不流动，就永远没有下一场派对，哈啊……我
得好好想想。

孑立.encontent: Interesting ... Maybe I should make a bigger sound?
孑立.content: 奇怪……或许我应该弄出更大的响声？

问候.encontent:
Oh! Nice to meet you! Nice to meet you! Nice to meet
 you!
问候.content: 哦！很高兴见到你！很高兴见到你！很高兴见到你！

朝晨.encontent:
... Oh, I guess I should say "Good morning" now? Okay,
 sorry, I forgot it again. Let's start over, lie down
 please.
朝晨.content:
……哦，这个时候应该说早安？好的，抱歉，我又忘记了
，让我们重来一次吧，请你躺下。

信任-朝晨.encontent:
Would you like to touch the viscera in the balloon?
 They're soft and bouncy, like a jelly. The jelly best
 for breakfast.
信任-朝晨.content:
你想摸摸看骨骼气球里面的内脏吗？它们很柔软，也很有
弹性，像是果汁果冻。最适合当早餐的果汁果冻。

夜暮.encontent:
Don't you think it's too quiet? At night, or evening,
 this time? Everyone is asleep! What an incredible
 waste of time! Is that sleep? Or a coma?
夜暮.content:
不觉得太安静了吗？夜里，或者说晚上，这种时候？所有
人都睡了！真是不可思议的浪费时间！那是睡眠吗？还是
昏厥？

信任-夜暮.encontent: ... I'm going out. Wanna come with me? Please?
信任-夜暮.content: ……我要出去一趟。你也想跟着一起来吗？来吧？

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
I keep thinking and thinking about how to hold a party and join
 it. Oh—if someone opens my head, you know, just open it! You'll
 see the draft of party plans all over the floor like brains.
帽檐与发鬓.content:
我总是不停地在想、不停地在想如何举办与参加派对，哦
——如果有谁打开了我的脑袋，你知道，就是打开它！一
定会看到派对策划草稿流得满地都是！

衣着与身形.encontent:
Starting here, it is called the skull, the collarbone,
 the ribs, the ulna, the radius and the rainbow lollipop
 I hide in my body!
衣着与身形.content:
从这里开始，依次是颅骨、锁骨、肋骨、尺骨、桡骨，和
我藏在身上的七彩棒棒糖！

嗜好.encontent:
There is nothing I love more than the smile on a crying
 kid. Smile more, everyone.
嗜好.content:
我最喜欢看到的是哭着的孩子露出笑容。再多笑点吧，所
有人都是。

赞赏.encontent:
You're the best party partner, the best kid and adult I've ever
 met! Although I don't understand what's a kid and what's an
 adult, I just wanna say, you're the best? You know what I mean?
赞赏.content:
你是我遇到过最好的派对拍档，最好的孩子和最好的大人
！虽然我并不明白什么是孩子，什么又是大人，我只想说
，你是最好的？你明白我的意思吗？

亲昵.encontent:
Please take my balloon with you, so that people can
 see it, and I can find you within a second.
亲昵.content:
请带着我送给你的气球，这样大家都能看见它，我也能一
下就找到你。

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
Please, keep those horrible people away from me! I
 do not want to know any medicine or potion formula
 that leaves a bitter taste in the mouth! Yikes!
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
拜托，让那些可怕的人离我远点吧！我不想知道什么药，也
不想知道什么让人嘴巴发苦的药剂配方！真是讨厌！

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
When I was little, I had a dream. I saw many kids buried in the
 ground, their tiny hands exposed, like newly growing potatoes.
 And then I woke up, I started to throw up balloons.
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
在我小时候，我做过一个梦。我梦见许多孩子的身体埋入
土地，他们细小的手掌暴露在外，像是新抽芽的土豆。后
来我醒来，开始呕吐出气球。

独白.encontent:
I wanna be like my parents, but not exactly the same.
 With these balloons, I can do what they can't.
独白.content:
我想成为和我父母一样的人，却不想成为和我父母完全一
样的人。我有这些气球，就得做他们做不到的事。

入队.encontent: Let us get to know each other.

战前.encontent: Let the helium fill your pulmonary lobe!
战前.content: 让氦气充满你的肺叶吧！

择选至终的仪式.encontent: Where's the party star? Where is it?
择选至终的仪式.content: 那个派对之星在哪儿？他在哪儿？

召唤至终的仪式.encontent:
The story begins with a bad adult. He did this first,
 then that, at last ... boom!
召唤至终的仪式.content:
故事要从“坏大人”说起，他先是这样，然后那样，最后
……爆炸啦！

战斗胜利.encontent:
It's time to say goodbye! Don't miss me, really, I'll
 be back! *sobbing*
战斗胜利.content:
该说再见了！别想念我，真的、我下次还会再来的！……呜
呜呜呜呜哇哇。

洞悉.encontent:
I know what you mean. The next party, the bigger party.
 Hehee, I'm on it!
洞悉.content:
我明白你的意思，下一场派对，更大的派对。嘻嘻，我立
刻就去准备——

洞悉之底.encontent:
Ah! I see the peaceful families, and the lawns under
 the sun ...  Kids who are suffering, please come to
 me! Or ... I will go to you.
洞悉之底.content:
啊！我看到了和睦的家庭，阳光下的草坪……受伤的孩子
呀，请都到我这里来！或者……我往你们那儿去。
